views.view: SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Demo [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.Demo](T1.Demo_Id, T1.Demo_Cursus, T1.Demo_Omschrijving) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Demo_Id, T.Cursus AS Demo_Cursus, T.Omschrijving AS Demo_Omschrijving, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstContext.Demos AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Demos [CodeFirstDemo.Demo](T1.Demo_Id, T1.Demo_Cursus, T1.Demo_Omschrijving) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Demo_Id, T.Cursus AS Demo_Cursus, T.Omschrijving AS Demo_Omschrijving, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.Demo AS T ) AS T1
